physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a snowy landscape in Murree
 Punjab. There is a path in the middle of the photograph
 with a fence on the left. The path is bordered by tall
 snow-covered trees on either side. In the middle of the path
 there is a man wearing a helmet
 and holding a long stick. In the background
 there are roofed houses on a hill. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a snowy landscape in Murree, Punjab. There is a path in the middle of the photograph, with a fence on the left. The path is bordered by tall, snow-covered trees on either side. In the middle of the path, there is a man wearing a helmet, and holding a long stick. In the background, there are roofed houses on a hill. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
